definition: Danba county (Tibetan: rong brag rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: Danba Hydropower Station is located in Ganzi Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture in Sichuan Province Danba County.
sentences.chinese: 丹巴水電站位於四川省甘孜藏族自治州丹巴縣境內。

sentences.english: Yanzigou gold deposit is located in Yongxi dome core of Ganzi Danba county in Sichuan province.
sentences.chinese: 燕子溝金礦牀位於四川甘孜州丹巴縣，永西穹窿核部。
